LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_PlateHelmetHeavy.label: heavy plate helmet
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_PlateHelmetHeavy.descripti: A bulky medieval helmet that provides full-head coverage. Offers a considerable amount of protection but restricts the wearer's field of vision.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_JesterHat.label: jester hat
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_JesterHat.description: A hat worthy of a jester. Each half is different from the other one in color.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_DameHat.label: dame hat
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_DameHat.description: A beautiful long cone hat for a dame.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_KingsCrown.label: king's crown
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_KingsCrown.description: A beautiful metal crown. The wearer becomes very influential, but at the same time they will refuse to do any work.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_PlagueMask.label: plague mask
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_PlagueMask.description: A mask with a long ‘beak’ filled with herbal medicine that keeps infected pawns at a distance.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_HeavyLeatherHelmet.label: heavy leather helmet
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_HeavyLeatherHelmet.descrip: A strong medieval helmet that provides full-head coverage. While it offers fantastic protection, one's vision is greatly obscured, thus it is only recommended for front line infantry, particularly those foregoing shields.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_LeatherHelmet.label: leather helmet
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_LeatherHelmet.description: A simple leather helmet designed to not block ones communication during combat. Often worn by front line, shield-wielding infantry to soak damage.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_PaddedHelmet.label: padded helmet
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_PaddedHelmet.description: A simple leather helmet designed to not block one's communication during combat. Often worn by front line, shield-wielding infantry to soak damage.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_Chaperon.label: chaperon
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_Chaperon.description: A stylish and versatile hood with a wrapped tail, favored by diplomats and merchants. It lends an air of authority, subtly improving negotiation skills.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_Cap.label: cap
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_Cap.description: A sleek, feathered cap worn by skilled archers and woodland hunters. Its lightweight design keeps vision clear and focus sharp, making it easier to land precise shots.
